@Bloodcompany wrote:

hi,

I’m having a javascript for showing an image in my table when clicking a link,
on FireFox everything works perfect, but on IE it just won’t work!

this is my code:

<a style="color:#7D0C0C; font-size:20" href="#" onclick="showInfo('Action','DodgeIt/Screenshot.png','Dodge_It')">More info</a>

this is my function:

function showInfo(type,image,name)
{
	document.getElementById('type').innerHTML = type;
	document.getElementById('screenshot').innerHTML = "<img src=" + image + " alt=" + name +" width=100% height=75%>";
}

the “type” works fine in both browsers,
only the screenshot wont work in IE. (I know I’m bad with javascript…)

thx,
Bloodcompany
